drool.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to let saliva (=the liquid in your mouth) come out of your mouth
drool.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The dog was drooling at the mouth.
drool.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to show in a silly way that you like someone or something a lot
drool.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: He was drooling over a Porsche.
